from public_web.utils import manifest_parser

manifest_parser.clear_cache()
# R√©cup√©rer les apps publiques

")

import os, sys, django
sys.path.append('.')
os.environ.setdefault('DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE', 'core.settings')
django.setup()
from app_manager.models import App
print('üìã Applications disponibles en production:')
for app in App.objects.all():
    print(f'  - {app.display_name} (code: {app.code})')
print(f'Total: {App.objects.count()} applications')
")

Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=core.settings_test poetry run python -c "
from core.views import get_preferred_language
from django.test import RequestFactory
from django.conf import settings

# Test the improved language detection
factory = RequestFactory()

# Test normal operation
request = factory.get('/', HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE='fr,en;q=0.9')
lang = get_preferred_language(request)
print(f'Normal operation: {lang}')

# Test malformed header (should not crash)
request = factory.get('/', HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE=';;invalid;;')
lang = get_preferred_language(request)
print(f'Malformed header: {lang}')

# Test empty header
request = factory.get('/')
lang = get_preferred_language(request)
print(f'No header: {lang}')

# Test configuration
print(f'Supported languages: {[code for code, name in settings.LANGUAGES]}')
")

import django
django.setup()
from lms.apps.tenants.models import OrganizationUser, Organization
from lms.apps.tenants.db_router import set_current_database, clear_current_database

print(''=== Nettoyage des utilisateurs dans les bases tenant ==='')

# V√©rifier les utilisateurs dans la base par d√©faut
clear_current_database()
main_users = OrganizationUser.objects.all()
print(f''Utilisateurs dans la base principale: {main_users.count()}'')
for user in main_users:
    print(f''  - {user.username}: {user.email}'')

print(''\n=== Test authentification dans base principale ==='')
from django.contrib.auth import authenticate

user = authenticate(username=''john.doe'', password=''student123'')
print(f''Authentification john.doe: {user}'')

if user:
    print(''‚úÖ L\''authentification fonctionne dans la base principale'')
else:
    print(''‚ùå Probl√®me d\''authentification'')
")

Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=core.settings_test poetry run python -c "
from django.test import TestCase
from django.contrib.auth import get_user_model
from rest_framework.test import APITestCase, APIClient
from rest_framework import status
from django.urls import reverse
from apps.revision.models import FlashcardDeck

User = get_user_model()

client = APIClient()
user = User.objects.create_user(username=''testuser'', email=''test@example.com'', password=''testpass123'')
deck = FlashcardDeck.objects.create(user=user, name=''Test Deck'')

url = reverse(''revision:deck-learning-settings'', args=[deck.id])
response = client.get(url)
print(f''Status: {response.status_code}'')
print(f''Data: {response.data}'')
")

Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=core.settings_test python -c "
import django; django.setup()
from django.contrib.auth.models import AnonymousUser
from django.test import RequestFactory
from rest_framework.test import APIRequestFactory
factory = APIRequestFactory()
request = factory.get(''/test/'')
print(f''User: {request.user}'')
print(f''Is authenticated: {request.user.is_authenticated}'')
print(f''Type: {type(request.user)}'')
")
